articles.title: Mani Padisetti: Empowering Finance Leaders to Navigate the AI Revolution

articles.summary: Yann LeCun is thinking about leaving Meta Platforms and launching a new startup. It would focus on developing so-called world models, a different path from the large language models that Meta is pursuing as an avenue to superintelligence, or AI that is smarter than humans.

articles.title: Meta's SPICE framework lets AI systems teach themselves to reason
articles.summary: Researchers at Meta FAIR and the National University of Singapore have developed a new reinforcement learning framework for self-improving AI systems called Self-Play In Corpus Environments (SPICE). The framework pits two AI agents against each other and gradually improves without human supervision.

articles.title: Meta's SPICE framework lets AI systems teach themselves to reason

articles.summary: Researchers at Meta FAIR and the National University of Singapore have developed a new reinforcement learning framework for self-improving AI systems. The number of people spending six or more months searching for a job has increased by 50%.

articles.title: Cleveland defense attorney faces scrutiny for AI-generated court filings
articles.author: David Gambino
articles.summary: Cleveland defense attorney William Norman used artificial intelligence to draft a motion to reopen an appeal in the case of Malikhi Coleman, a man convicted of murder in Ashtabula County. The motion included quotes that did not exist in the trial transcript. Norman admitted to using ChatGPT and paid $2,000 to the prosecutor's office as part of a settlement for the error. Cuyahoga County prosecutors moved to sanction Norman for a document that seeks to withdraw the guilty plea of a man who admitted to failing to comply with a police officer.

articles.summary: A webinar designed for small business owners explains how artificial intelligence (AI) can streamline operations, enhance customer service and boost your bottom line without breaking the bank. It explains what AI is and how it can help your business save time and money. It also explains the tools you can start using today.

articles.title: White House Takes Action on AI
articles.author: News USA
articles.summary: The release of America's AI Action Plan is the most consequential artificial intelligence policy development of the current administration to date, according to experts at the Special Competitive Studies Project (SCSP). SCSP is a nonprofit and nonpartisan initiative with a goal to strengthen America's long-term competitiveness in AI.
